  • Generic Networks
  • View page source

Generic NetworksÂ¶

Besides creating your own grids through the pandapower API pandapower provides generic networks through the networks module. The pandapower networks modul contains simple test networks, randomly generated networks, CIGRE test networks, IEEE case files and generic networks from the dissertation of Georg Kerber.

You can find documentation for the individual modules here:

  • Example Networks
    • Simple Example Network
    • Multi-Voltage Level Example Network
  • Simple pandapower test networks
    • Four load branch
    • Four loads with branches out
    • Four bus system
    • Medium voltage open ring
  • CIGRE Networks
    • High voltage transmission network
    • Medium voltage distribution network
    • Medium voltage distribution network with DER
    • Low voltage distribution network
  • MV Oberrhein
  • IEEE cases
    • Case 4gs
    • Case 6ww
    • Case 9
    • Case 9Q
    • Case 30
    • Case 30pwl
    • Case 30Q
  • Kerber networks
    • Average Kerber networks
    • Extreme Kerber networks
  • Random pandapower networks
    • Random line network
    • Random empty grid
